entry.title: Goodbye Bitcoin
entry.summary: In a brief email sent to both the kanzure and ln mailing lists, Prayank announced his departure from anything related to Bitcoin. He states that any usage of his username on GitHub or other platforms should be considered as someone else using it. The email does not provide any further explanation or context regarding Prayank's decision to step away from Bitcoin-related matters. Along with the email, Prayank included his public key, A3B1 E430 2298 178F, in the message.
